channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jamie Dimon turned down Jeff Bezos and a top gig at Amazon to take on ‘troubled’ Bank One in a $60 million bet
item.description: Dimon told the "Acquired" podcast that the version of his life where he moved to Seattle to work at Amazon is an "alternate universe."

item.title: The world is melting. This shade map is the only thing that can save us
item.description: The sun is liquifying Madrid. Again. June 2025 shattered temperature records, with Spain recording its hottest June since weather records began in 196...

item.title: The World’s Best Golfer Just Said Success Can’t Fulfill the ‘Deepest Wants and Desires of Your Heart.’ Science Says He’s Right
item.description: Scottie Scheffler on success, fulfillment, and what really matters in life, both professionally and personally.

item.title: UNO goes clubbing: Inside Mattel’s wild new plan to reinvent game night

item.title: Virtuos helped make one of the year’s best-selling video games. Now, 300 of its workers may be out of a job
item.description: The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered became the third-best-selling video game of 2025 in less than a week.

item.title: As AI comes for entry-level gigs, Whole Foods exec says the $13.7 billion grocer is reviving artisans with butcher, cheese, and bakery apprenticeships

item.title: This Social-Media Expert Predicts That 1 Influencer Strategy Will Soon Be Everywhere
item.description: This content lends brands much-needed authenticity, says creator economy expert Keith Bendes.

item.title: New Data Shows 2 Types of Exits Are Becoming More Attainable–and 1 That’s Still Out of Reach
item.description: PitchBook’s latest venture capital report gives a snapshot of rebounding U.S. exit activity in 2025.

item.title: Social Security benefits update: SSA is making a major change this year that will impact many seniors

item.title: Slack’s paid users are getting new time-saving AI tools
item.description: Tools are meant to improve productivity.

item.title: A Collab Among Competitors? Why Amazon Is Partnering With SpaceX on Satellite Launches
item.description: An unlikely collaboration between Amazon and SpaceX shows that practicality can trump rivalry when it comes to the space race.

item.title: Scientists Just Figured Out How Coffee May Slow Aging
item.description: Evidence is mounting that coffee slows aging and helps you stay healthy. Scientists are starting to figure out exactly why.

item.title: Trump’s Coca Cola post tanked share prices for high fructose corn syrup makers
item.description: Shares for Archer-Daniels-Midland and Ingredion both fell at least 6% in after hours trading.
